name: lsd-storage
description: Persistently stores updates to an application and synchronises them with other instances of the application
author: Paul Boocock <paulb@ashridgetech.com>

scripts.build-dev: npm update lsd-observable && npm run build && npm version prerelease --no-git-tag
scripts.test: mocha --recursive --ui bdd test/store && mocha --recursive --ui bdd test/functional
